verses.verse: "Hear, <WH8085> O Israel! <WH3478> You are crossing <WH5674> over <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383> today <WH3117> to go <WH935> in to dispossess <WH3423> nations <WH1471> greater <WH1419> and mightier <WH6099> than <WH4480> you, great <WH1419> cities <WH5892> fortified <WH1219> to heaven, <WH8064>

a people <WH5971> great <WH1419> and tall, <WH7311> the sons <WH1121> of the Anakim, <WH6062> whom <WH834> you know <WH3045> and of whom <WH834> you have heard <WH8085> [it said], 'Who <WH4310> can stand <WH3320> before <WH6440> the sons <WH1121> of Anak <WH6061>?'

"Know <WH3045> therefore today <WH3117> that it is the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> who is crossing <WH5674> over <WH5674> before <WH6440> you as a consuming <WH398> fire. <WH784> He will destroy <WH8045> them and He will subdue <WH3665> them before <WH6440> you, so that you may drive <WH3423> them out and destroy them quickly, <WH6> just <WH4118> as the Lord <WH9201> has spoken <WH3068> to you.

"Do not say <WH559> in your heart <WH3824> when the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> has driven <WH1920> them out before <WH4480> <WH6440> you, 'Because of my righteousness <WH6666> the Lord <WH3068> has brought <WH935> me in to possess <WH3423> this <WH2088> land, <WH776> 'but [it is] because of the wickedness <WH7564> of these <WH428> nations <WH1471> [that] the Lord <WH3068> is dispossessing <WH3423> them before <WH4480> <WH6440> you.

"It is not for your righteousness <WH6666> or for the uprightness <WH3476> of your heart <WH3824> that you are going <WH935> to possess <WH3423> their land, <WH776> but [it is] because <WH3588> of the wickedness <WH7564> of these <WH428> nations <WH1471> [that] the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> is driving <WH3423> them out before <WH4480> <WH6440> you, in order <WH4616> to confirm <WH6965> the oath <WH1697> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> swore <WH7650> to your fathers, to Abraham, <WH1> Isaac <WH85> and Jacob. <WH3327>

"Know, <WH3045> then, [it is] not because of your righteousness <WH6666> [that] the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> is giving <WH5414> you this <WH2088> good <WH2896> land <WH776> to possess, <WH3423> for you are a stubborn <WH7186> <WH6203> people. <WH5971>

"Remember, <WH2142> do not forget <WH7911> how <WH854> <WH834> you provoked <WH7107> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> to wrath <WH7107> in the wilderness; <WH4057> from the day <WH3117> that you left <WH3318> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> until <WH5704> you arrived <WH935> at this <WH2088> place, <WH4725> you have been <WH1961> rebellious <WH4784> against <WH5973> the Lord. <WH3068>
"Even at Horeb <WH2722> you provoked <WH7107> the Lord <WH3068> to wrath, <WH7107> and the Lord <WH3068> was so angry <WH599> with you that He would have destroyed <WH8045> you.

"When I went <WH5927> up to the mountain <WH2022> to receive <WH3947> the tablets <WH3871> of stone, <WH68> the tablets <WH3871> of the covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> had made <WH3772> with you, then I remained <WH3427> on the mountain <WH2022> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and nights; <WH3915> I neither <WH3808> ate <WH398> bread <WH3899> nor <WH3808> drank <WH8354> water. <WH4325>

"And the Lord <WH3068> gave <WH5414> me the two <WH8147> tablets <WH3871> of stone <WH68> written <WH3789> by the finger <WH676> of God; <WH430> and on them [were] all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> had spoken <WH1696> with you at the mountain <WH2022> from the midst <WH8432> of the fire <WH784> on the day <WH3117> of the assembly. <WH6951>

"And it came <WH1961> about at the end <WH7093> of forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and nights <WH3915> that the Lord <WH3068> gave <WH5414> me the two <WH8147> tablets <WH3871> of stone, <WH68> the tablets <WH3871> of the covenant. <WH1285>

"Then the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, 'Arise, <WH6965> go <WH3381> down <WH3381> from here <WH2088> quickly, <WH4118> for your people <WH5971> whom <WH834> you brought <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4714> have acted <WH7843> corruptly. <WH7843> They have quickly <WH4118> turned <WH5493> aside <WH5493> from the way <WH1870> which <WH834> I commanded <WH6680> them; they have made <WH6213> a molten <WH4541> image <WH4541> for themselves.'
"The Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH559> further to me, saying, <WH559> 'I have seen <WH7200> this <WH2088> people, <WH5971> and indeed, <WH2009> it is a stubborn <WH7186> <WH6203> people. <WH5971>

'Let <WH7503> Me alone, <WH4480> <WH7503> that I may destroy <WH8045> them and blot <WH4229> out their name <WH8034> from under <WH8478> heaven; <WH8064> and I will make <WH6213> of you a nation <WH1471> mightier <WH6099> and greater <WH7227> than <WH4480> they.'

"So I turned <WH6437> and came <WH3381> down <WH3381> from the mountain <WH2022> while the mountain <WH2022> was burning <WH1197> with fire, <WH784> and the two <WH8147> tablets <WH3871> of the covenant <WH1285> were in my two <WH8147> hands. <WH3027>

"And I saw <WH7200> that you had indeed <WH2009> sinned <WH2398> against the Lord <WH3068> your God. <WH430> You had made <WH6213> for yourselves a molten <WH4541> calf; <WH5695> you had turned <WH5493> aside <WH5493> quickly <WH4118> from the way <WH1870> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> you.
"And I took <WH8610> hold <WH8610> of the two <WH8147> tablets <WH3871> and threw <WH7993> them from my hands, <WH3027> and smashed <WH7665> them before your eyes. <WH5869>

"And I fell <WH5307> down <WH5307> before <WH6440> the Lord, <WH3068> as at the first, <WH7223> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and nights; <WH3915> I neither <WH3808> ate <WH398> bread <WH3899> nor <WH3808> drank <WH8354> water, <WH4325> because <WH5921> of all <WH3605> your sin <WH9128> which <WH834> you had committed <WH2398> in doing <WH6213> what <WH7451> was evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the Lord <WH3068> to provoke <WH3707> Him to anger. <WH3707>

"For I was afraid <WH3025> of the anger <WH639> and hot <WH2534> displeasure <WH2534> with which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> was wrathful <WH7107> against <WH5921> you in order to destroy <WH8045> you, but the Lord <WH3068> listened <WH8085> to me that time <WH6471> also. <WH1571>
"And the Lord <WH3068> was angry <WH599> enough <WH3966> with Aaron <WH175> to destroy <WH8045> him; so I also <WH1571> prayed <WH6419> for Aaron <WH175> at the same <WH1931> time. <WH6256>

"And I took <WH3947> your sinful <WH9128> [thing], the calf <WH5695> which <WH834> you had made, <WH6213> and burned <WH8313> it with fire <WH784> and crushed <WH3807> it, grinding <WH2912> it very <WH3190> small <WH3190> until <WH5704> <WH834> it was as fine <WH1854> as dust; <WH6083> and I threw <WH7993> its dust <WH6083> into the brook <WH5158> that came <WH3381> down <WH3381> from the mountain. <WH2022>
"Again at Taberah <WH8404> and at Massah <WH4532> and at Kibroth-hattaavah you provoked <WH7107> the Lord <WH3068> to wrath. <WH7107>

"And when the Lord <WH3068> sent <WH7971> you from Kadesh-barnea, saying, <WH559> 'Go <WH5927> up and possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> which <WH834> I have given <WH5414> you, 'then you rebelled <WH4784> against <WH854> the command <WH6310> of the Lord <WH3068> your God; <WH430> you neither <WH3808> believed <WH539> Him nor <WH3808> listened <WH8085> to His voice. <WH6963>
"You have been <WH1961> rebellious <WH4784> against <WH5973> the Lord <WH3068> from the day <WH3117> I knew <WH3045> you.

"So I fell <WH5307> down <WH5307> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> the forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and nights, <WH3915> which <WH834> I did <WH5307> because <WH3588> the Lord <WH3068> had said <WH559> He would destroy <WH8045> you.

"And I prayed <WH6419> to the Lord, <WH3068> and said, <WH559> 'O Lord <WH136> God, <WH3068> do not destroy <WH7843> Thy people, <WH5971> even Thine inheritance, <WH5159> whom <WH834> Thou hast redeemed <WH6299> through Thy greatness, <WH1433> whom <WH834> Thou hast brought <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4714> with a mighty <WH2389> hand. <WH3027>

'Remember <WH2142> Thy servants, <WH5650> Abraham, <WH85> Isaac, <WH3327> and Jacob; <WH3290> do not look <WH6437> at the stubbornness <WH7190> of this <WH2088> people <WH5971> or at their wickedness <WH7562> or their sin. <WH9128>

'Otherwise <WH6435> the land <WH776> from which <WH834> Thou didst bring <WH3318> us may say, <WH559> "Because <WH4480> <WH1097> the Lord <WH3068> was not able <WH3201> to bring <WH935> them into the land <WH776> which <WH834> He had promised <WH1696> them and because <WH4480> He hated <WH8135> them He has brought <WH3318> them out to slay <WH4191> them in the wilderness. <WH4057>"
'Yet they are Thy people, <WH5971> even Thine inheritance, <WH5159> whom <WH834> Thou hast brought <WH3318> out by Thy great <WH1419> power <WH3581> and Thine outstretched <WH5186> arm. <WH2220>'
